org.threadly.util

Class UnsafeAccess

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.threadly.util.UnsafeAccess

  • public class UnsafeAccess
extends java.lang.Object
    Used for internal access to UNSAFE actions. This uses the Unsafe class to do visibility modifications and potentially other low level access.
    Since:
    5.28
